Champaign.Market Place Shopping Center:
Market Place Shopping Center is an enclosed shopping mall located in Champaign, Illinois, USA. Its anchor stores are Bergner's, JCPenney, Dick's Sporting Goods and Macy's.


== History ==
The mall opened in 1975.
In May 2004, the management, General Growth Properties, was successful in signing JCPenney back into the mall.
